sentences.sContent: Ships towing huge magnets trolled the ocean floor.
sentences.sCn: 船只拖着巨大的磁石在海底进行拖捞作业。

synos.tran: 轮唱，使转动；放声高唱；拖饵钓鱼

words.tran: [船][水产] 曳绳钓渔船；拖钩渔船；小钓船

trans.tranCn: 用曳绳钓； 拖钓； 兴高采烈地唱
trans.tranOther: to try to remove something from a river, ocean etc by pulling a rope, line etc through the water
